jobs.title: Premium Flatbed Driver - Home Weekly
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Haul premium flatbed freight including lumber, coils, machinery, rebar, pipe, and oversized loads throughout the Eastern and Southeastern US. Enjoy weekly home time with modern equipment.

Pay & Mileage:

  • Gross Weekly Average: $1,400/week
  • Choice of pay: $0.53-0.55/mile OR 27% of load
  • Weekly minimum guarantee of $1,200 after 30 days
  • Performance bonuses up to $600/month
  • Path to Success Pay totaling $5,000 in first 120 days
  • Over-dimensional loads pay 7-15¢ more per mile
  • Tarp pay, detention pay, and layover pay included

Freight & Schedule:

Weekly home time options with consistent freight.
requirements: 1+ years flatbed experience
No more than 2 moving violations in 12 months
No more than 4 moving violations in 3 years
No more than 1 serious violation in 3 years
No more than 3 accidents in 36 months
benefits: Blue Cross/Blue Shield Medical, Dental & Prescription Insurance

jobs.title: Extended Haul Flatbed Driver
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Haul premium flatbed freight throughout the Western and Northern US with maximum miles and earnings potential. Top industry pay and modern equipment.

Pay & Mileage:

  • Gross Weekly Average: $1,600+/week
  • Choice of pay: $0.56-0.60/mile OR 27% of load
  • Weekly minimum guarantee of $1,200 after 30 days
  • Performance bonuses up to $600/month
  • Path to Success Pay totaling $5,000 in first 120 days
  • Over-dimensional loads pay 7-15¢ more per mile
  • Tarp pay, detention pay, and layover pay included

Freight & Schedule:

Extended runs with 2-3 months out followed by generous home time.
requirements: 1+ years flatbed experience
No more than 2 moving violations in 12 months
No more than 4 moving violations in 3 years
No more than 1 serious violation in 3 years
No more than 3 accidents in 36 months
benefits: Blue Cross/Blue Shield Medical, Dental & Prescription Insurance
